summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5256 for the improvement of West Bertona Street, from 5th Avenue West to 10th Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 60764, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
